alert.note: Alert for Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 730 PM MST... At 629 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Horn, or 17 miles southeast of Gila Bend, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Estrella, Sonoran National Monument, Freeman and Big Horn. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 127 and 144. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 10 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
